name: _id
description: The transaction hash.

name: data
description: Additional information for a transaction. It can contain a simple message, a function call, an ESDT transfer payload, and so on.

name: esdtValues
description: A list of ESDT values that are transferred based on the data field.

name: fee
description: The amount of EGLD the sender paid for the transaction.

name: function
description: The name of the function that is called in case of a smart contract call.

name: gasLimit
description: The maximum gas units the sender is willing to pay for.

name: gasPrice
description: The amount to be paid for each gas unit.

name: gasUsed
description: The amount of gas used by the transaction.

name: hasOperations
description: True if the transaction has smart contract results.

name: hasLogs
description: True if the transaction has logs.

name: hasScResults
description: True if the transaction has smart contract results.

name: initialPaidFee
description: The initial amount of EGLD the sender paid for the transaction, before the refund.

name: isRelayed
description: True if the transaction is a relayed transaction.

name: isScCall
description: True if the transaction is a smart contract call.

name: miniBlockHash
description: The hash of the miniblock in which the transaction was included.

name: nonce
description: The transaction sequence number of the sender address.

name: operation
description: The operation of the transaction based on the data field.

name: receiver
description: The destination address of the transaction.

name: receiverShard
description: The shard ID of the receiver address.

name: receivers
description: A list of receiver addresses in case of ESDTNFTTransfer or MultiESDTTransfer.

name: receiversShardIDs
description: A list of receiver addresses shard IDs.

name: receiverUserName
description: The username of the receiver address.

name: round
description: The round of the block when the transaction was executed.

name: sender
description: The address of the transaction sender.

name: senderShard
description: The shard ID of the sender address.

name: senderUserName
description: The username of the sender address.

name: signature
description: The signature of the transaction, hex-encoded.

name: status
description: The status of the transaction.

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction was executed.

name: tokens
description: A list of ESDT tokens that are transferred based on the data field. The indices from the `tokens` list are linked with the indices from `esdtValues` list.

name: value
description: The amount of EGLD to be sent from the sender to the receiver.

name: version
description: The version of the transaction.
